Surface Laptop for Business, Copilot+ PC, 13.8 and 15-inch | Intel

Surface Laptop for Business, 7ᵗʰ Edition, the first Copilot+ PC¹ built exclusively for business with Intel® Core™ Ultra processors (Series 2). Tackle demanding workloads with powerful performance, all-day battery life,² and new, unique AI experiences only available on Copilot+ PCs¹ that help make your device smarter, faster, and more creative.
Bundle and save up to $223 when you add a select mouse and protection plan.
Experience stunning visuals on the Surface PixelSense™ Flow touchscreen, featuring razor-thin bezels, a 3:2 ratio, and your choice of screen size.
Enjoy a sleek, lightweight laptop engineered from aluminum that’s been tested for durability and reliability.
Researcher and Analyst agents are now available with Microsoft 365 Copilot. Sign in to your work account to get started today.

"Nothing’s more important than helping more kids, and that’s what Copilot allows us to do. It helps us work smarter, give more—and make an even greater impact."
“When I was analyzing the information, I would spend three or four hours looking at the data and making graphs. With Copilot, it takes less than an hour to do that same work.”

“The use of Teams as a real-time communication hub within our tenant and across our clients’ tenants increases our speed of delivery by 50% and helps us to model the visibility and transparency the construction industry needs.”

“The fact that Copilot quickly generates meeting recaps with notes and action items has actually changed the way we structure our meetings. We can look at these recaps and see where we’ve veered off topic, so we’ve streamlined our agendas to be more effective and skip over the redundancies.”

“I love that it's in our environment. It's able to cross pollinate and gather information from all of the data we've got in Microsoft 365. As a business owner that's really important to me because it keeps our people working inside our systems.”

New Technology: The Projected Total Economic Impact™ Of Microsoft 365 Copilot for SMB
Small business software made for all the ways you work
Easily communicate with customers and employees. Create, share, and store files securely from a single cloud-first platform.
Start meetings with anyone and boost engagement with virtual backgrounds, recordings, transcriptions, and AI-powered recaps.
Get work done with people inside and outside your company. Send messages, react with emojis, create teams, and coordinate events—all from one app.
Get things done in one place
Collaborate on documents in real time and reduce context switching by working in Microsoft 365 apps right from Teams.
Proactively reduce risk while helping employees stay in the flow of work. Have peace of mind knowing sensitive information is encrypted in all chats, calls, meetings, and files.
Streamline communication with Copilot in Teams
Track discussions in real time and summarize conversations.
Remove barriers between spaces, places, and people with small business software that empowers teams to work together, all in one place.
Host meetings of all kinds from anywhere
Find the right Teams plan for your small business
There are several ways to get Teams for your small business. Compare plans and pricing to find the small business software solution that works best for you.
Unlimited group meetings for up to 30 hours and 300 participants
10 GB of cloud storage per user
Real-time collaboration with file sharing, tasks, and polling
Standard security with data encryption for meetings, chats, calls, and files
Everything offered in Teams Essentials, plus:
Identity and access management for up to 300 users
Web and mobile versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and other apps
1 TB of cloud storage per user
10+ additional apps (including Microsoft Bookings, Planner, and Forms)
Everything offered in Business Basic, plus:
Desktop, web, and mobile versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and other apps
Chat, call, meet, and host webinars
10+ additional apps (including Microsoft Loop, Clipchamp, Bookings, Planner, and Forms)

After your one-month free trial, you will be charged the applicable subscription fee. Credit card required. Cancel any time to stop future charges.
Free shipping on every purchase, no catch
2-3 day shipping at no cost, no minimum amount.
60-day free returns on physical products when you shop with Microsoft.
If we drop the price of a physical product or you find it lower at an eligible retailer within 60 days, we'll give you a one-time price match.
Flexible payment options help you pay how you want, at Microsoft Store.
Get the help you want, when you want
Customer service support is available by phone and chat, on web or your phone. You can also self-serve with a variety of topics in our Support Hub.
Protect your device against accidents for up to 4 years. Shop smarter with Microsoft Complete and get technical support, as well.
Cash out when you trade in
When you trade in an eligible device, you get cash back and your device is recycled.

This offer is operated by Teladvance, LLC and is not sponsored by Microsoft. Any appraised value will be determined at trade in and provided by Teladvance. All trade-ins and reimbursements are subject to Teladvance’s sole discretion and approval.
Warranties, extended service plans, and Terms & Conditions for your device

Microsoft Complete for Surface: For covered defects and/or accidental damage, maximum of two (2) claims. Each claim is subject to a $49 deductible. Microsoft Complete for Xbox: For mechanical breakdowns and/or accidental damage claims, maximum of: one (1) Xbox console replacement; two (2) Xbox One standard controller replacements OR one (1) Xbox Elite Controller replacement (whichever is applicable to your purchase); and one (1) associated power supply unit with attaching cords replacement, when such are originally supplied by Microsoft within a single, all-in-one packaged purchase. Microsoft Complete for Type Cover and Microsoft Complete for Xbox Elite Controller: For covered defects and/or accidental damage, maximum of one (1) claims.

Surface Laptop for Business, Copilot+ PC, 13-inch | Snapdragon

The lightest Surface Laptop delivers built-in AI experiences and impressive performance powered by Snapdragon® X Plus processors. With a vibrant 13-inch touchscreen¹⁴ and all-day battery life,² you can focus on getting more done from anywhere, and do so with industry-leading Microsoft chip-to-cloud security for peace of mind.
Enjoy up to 23 hours of battery
Surface Pro for Business, Copilot+ PC, 12-inch | Snapdragon

The lightest and most flexible Copilot+ PC¹ empowers you to save time and achieve more. Power your productivity with Snapdragon® X Plus processors and use your device with touch, voice, pen,² and Surface Pro 12-inch Keyboard for Business.² Industry leading Microsoft chip-to-cloud security keeps your data safe for peace of mind.
